评论概述: Beat travel bag and decent size
评论详情: For those that don’t know how to use to usb, you have to connect the black corn that is inside the bag in the little pocket to a portable charger  THEN plug your charger plug into the outside outlet of the bag. The usb won’t work/charge unless a portable charger is connected. So basically you can either use a portable charger alone or plug in the portable charger to the inside of the bad and use it like that. The quality is nice there are so many pockets convenient for traveling

I bought this particular bag for my on-campus classes,  Which is just 2 classes so this bag should definitely serve its purpose. My negative feedback is that I wish the material wasn't so canvas type but I just received my bag from Amazon, so time will tell wether this exterior fabric/material is going to work well with rain and snow. Fingers crossed 🤞.  And I do have a laptop aswell; I was a little hesitant that it would not fit my 15 in 💻,  guess what, it did!!. I have had this bag on my wishlist for a long time, so I decided to buy it during prime day while it was on sale. My only regret was not buying it sooner. This is the perfect bag for traveling. It holds so many things! Five books, a small camping table, my tablet, switch, and so much more. Its perfect for bringing what I need to vending shows. Its comfortable to wear and the colors are adorable, not to mention the material feels durable and is not rough on the hands. Highly recommend if you travel a lot or go to vending shows.

评论概述: Good to use as a nurse bag or even for school.
评论详情: Love the colors and I love how there’s lots of pockets.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!! You can fit sooo much inside it, and even when it's just about at max capacity it'll still fit under an airplane seat. The canvas it's made of feels very good quality, and I've had it for a while now and used it on several flights and it still looks great, no broken zippers or fraying anywhere. The color that I got is also very accurate to the pictures (on my screen, at least). There's a ton of pockets, and while I usually just use the laptop one, I like them when I need them. I haven't tried the phone-charging part yet, so I can't say how well that works. The horizontal straps on the back of it mean I can easily rest it on my larger luggage if I'm going to be stuck in an airport for a while. Also I keep referencing flying because I feel like that's the target audience for this but I also just use it any time I need to take my laptop (or anything that can't fit in a purse) anywhere. If I had to choose something to nitpick about it, I'd say the ends of the zippers sticking out looks a little strange, but that's literally necessary for the bag to open at all - you pretty much need to unzip it all the way any time you need to get something out of it because of how the top part is designed. If they changed it at all, the bag wouldn't be able to hold as much, so in the grand scheme of things I totally don't mind it. The zippers themselves are also great quality, I've had no issues with them so far. They feel sturdy.

So many pockets! The laptop pocket fits my 17in laptop with room to spare for my document case. All of the cupholders can fit my 40oz Stanley. Love the pleather at the bottom of the bag and the striped inside fabric. Good color choices. Will be taking it to the zoo soon so will be updating my review with comfort levels and actual functionality for myself. Overall seems like a good buy, just wish it were cheaper. Update: it is comfortable and functional!

I've had the bookbag for over two months. I love it! It has a perfect spot for my laptop, and all my books! It has been rained on and my stuff on the inside is safe and dry! I am very hard on book bags and this one is standing up to me very well!!!

I have 6 kids, ages 20m to 11y. I only have the 20m old in diapers. We always have a pack of wipes, 3 diapers (Pampers Snugglers size 4), an extra outfit. I really appreciate the flat pockets; we try not to bring too many toys with us, and we have 5 Boogie Boards from the Target $5 area. They fit perfectly in this bag, in a flat side pocket.  I don't use the wipes outer pocket, and I do wish it was a pocket without that hole. I don't use the phone pocket as much as I'd like but oh well.  I do like how it opens wide, although, if those bars are turned funny, it can stab me in the back sometimes and it's unpleasant.  Color is great! Overall a great bag. Would like to buy more.

I LOVE this backpack. Good material, nice shape, so many pockets. This backpack made traveling so easy. Everything I needed was within reach due to the multiple pockets and different compartments. Love the side pockets too, I can have my water bottle within reach every time I need it. 10/10
